item.title: How to Set Up Backstage On K8s with Helm - part 1, set up for success
item.description: I recently set up Backstage.io on our cluster. It wasn’t super-easy, so I decided to “go deep” and tried to make this a learning opportiunity. I’m also definitely not a DevOps expert, so I had to learn some stuff myself along the way. Here’s my best approximation at a useful guide for anyone who’s going to walk the same path! Hopefully I can save you some time. Part 1 In this part we’re going to:
